channel.title: ::GBS Command
channel.description:
Hey, is it possible if I can make a command like ::GBS so during a battle if a player wishes to get their stuff after they die it automatically goes to their inventory once they die? Can someone give me the code for it if possible? Thank You and have a nice day!
- Eric E.

item.title: ::GBS Command
item.dc:creator: @vic_08 Vic_
item.description:
@vic_08 wrote:

[quote=“Eric E., post:7, topic:233428”]No, the dueling make’s the whole place a fun place. I just want it so that they type ::gbs and ONLY FOR THEM when they die they don’t lose their stuff.

  • Eric E.[/quote]

    Then code it, there is no code for what you are talking about. Learn how to do it yourself.

Read full topic

item.title: ::GBS Command
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“Yz85Racer, post:12, topic:233428”][quote author=Eric E. link=topic=307841.msg2461396#msg2461396 date=1222493224]
Alright, thanks anyways.

Appreciate it!

  • Eric E.
    [/quote]
    Just keep track of whether or not to keep the items, it’s not hard.

ps: Bruce Lee is gay.[/quote]

Agreed. I’ve made a command similar to your “GBS” command.

Read full topic

item.title: ::GBS Command
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

[quote=“tonypker13, post:9, topic:233428”][quote author=Eric E. link=topic=307841.msg2461368#msg2461368 date=1222492340]
No, the dueling make’s the whole place a fun place. I just want it so that they type ::gbs and ONLY FOR THEM when they die they don’t lose their stuff.

  • Eric E.
    [/quote]

I don’t really think this is possible to be honest.
You’d have to make a code that somehow detects the items you had last before you died.
Then it would have to somehow locate the player who looted and returned it…
I really don’t think this is possible.
Then again, I’m one person.[/quote]you would have to work it around the loan code. Not sure if they’re in 503+, considering i haven’t coded one yet. But it would sorta have the same concept.

Read full topic

item.title: ::GBS Command
item.dc:creator: @tonypker13 tonypker13
item.description:
@tonypker13 wrote:

[quote=“Eric E., post:7, topic:233428”]No, the dueling make’s the whole place a fun place. I just want it so that they type ::gbs and ONLY FOR THEM when they die they don’t lose their stuff.

  • Eric E.[/quote]

I don’t really think this is possible to be honest.
You’d have to make a code that somehow detects the items you had last before you died.
Then it would have to somehow locate the player who looted and returned it…
I really don’t think this is possible.
Then again, I’m one person.

Read full topic

item.title: ::GBS Command
item.dc:creator: @kihomura Kihomura
item.description:
@kihomura wrote:

This is a no spoon feeding community. I think it actually says that on the TOS. So, you're most likely not going to get a code from anyone so you can just copy and paste it on here. Be sure to read the rules too, it says that you should post something to show that you have tried it out, or at least attempted a previous search before asking for help.

NO Spoonfeeding.

Read full topic

@The_Reaper_X wrote:

[quote=“Eric E., post:5, topic:233428”]Alright, can we stop going off topic please?

Can someone PLEASE get me the code?

  • Eric E.[/quote]try looking for a “dueling” tutorial or something. This is a no spoon feeding community. I think it actually says that on the TOS. So, you’re most likely not going to get a code from anyone so you can just copy and paste it on here. Be sure to read the rules too, it says that you should post something to show that you have tried it out, or at least attempted a previous search before asking for help.

item.title: ::GBS Command
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

[quote=“kihomura, post:2, topic:233428”]Just make a fun pking area, don’t make that command, or people would never get stuff when they kill the other person.[/quote]the only thing that i hate about fun pk is that if you make the safe tele spot too close to where you died, the server gets all stupid and the character update isn’t right. Like you’re in one spot but reads differently for others.

Read full topic
